title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 350.4 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 350.4 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part is applicable to all JD, PINS, family offense, custody, adoption, guardianship and neglect/abuse pre-dispositional
investigations and pre-plea reports for the family courts and supreme or
surrogate court where applicable and to all adult/youthful offender pre-plea, pre- sentence and any certificates of relief from disabilities investigations
and reports for the criminal courts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
350.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
